评论详情: I was, WAS, a hoodie guy until I donned one of these crew necks. And I know what you’re thinking “these are cheap and probably feel cheap and smell cheap” but they are quit the opposite. I’m a fairly good lookin’ dude and these easily take me up a notch. Now, I do shave my head and have a few fuzzies stuck to my stubble when I take them off, but it’s a small price to pay for the wonderment that is this crew neck.

评论详情: I recently purchased the Fruit of the Loom Men's Moisture Wicking Eversoft Fleece Sweatshirt, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! The Eversoft fleece makes it feel like you're wrapped in a cloud, perfect for those chilly days or lounging at home. I also love the moisture-wicking feature; it keeps me comfortable and dry, whether working out or running errands.  Overall, this sweatshirt combines comfort, style, and functionality. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a cozy addition to their wardrobe. You won't be disappointed! All three colors look great!

评论详情: I keep the temperature set low in the house during the winter.  I have a heat pump that STRUGGLES to produce heat below 40 degrees.  Currently the outdoor temp is 23 degrees.  The aux heat kicks in and the electric meter spins.  BTW I really dislike heat pumps.  I did not really wear this sweatshirt much after I bought it.  I have my favorite 30+ year old sweatshirt that I wore most of the time.  I decided to give this one a go this year...  I am sorry to say it is pilling all over.  Everywhere the arms touch on the body is pilling.  Under the arms is really bad.  I am guessing it is because there is only 50% cotton in it vs the 30+ year old sweatshirt is a 100% cotton.  It does not have a pill anywhere on it.  Anyway I am disappointed with how this sweatshirt is wearing.  I would not buy this item again.

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: Light Steel - 1 PackNumber of Items: 1
评论详情: Man, I generally don’t write reviews but this one I had too. The Hanes Eco line is awesome. I’m 6” and 165lbs. In other words I generally take tall sizes but these fit me perfectly. I also ordered the pants and hoodie. The pants are the perfect length plus some which I love (long inseam). If you’re looking for extreme weather loungewear, look elsewhere. These are great loungewear or cool weather exercise clothing. I bought the charcoal for walking and had to buy the grey for lounging because they are soooo comfortable. For short people you may find the pants somewhat long but I find them perfect. The price, well, you can’t beat it!
